title: David Robinson
text:
To Do

check min/ max values (year)
are there duplicates?
Plots

Histogram of shows by type as a function of release year
Are movies getting longer over time?

boxplot movie length by decade
movie genre by median duration by length
date added
rating percentage over time (by type)
stacked horizontal bar chart countries and n by type

Countries
Ratings
Duration

Data cleaning

listed_in split apart and melt?
separate words in description
year_added is the year part of date_added
confidence bound pct_mature = n_mature / n, conf_low = qbeta(0.025, n_mature + 0.5, n - n_mature + 0.5), conf_high = qbeta(0.975, n_mature + 0.5, n - n_mature + 0.5),

(qbeta(0.025, n_mature + 0.5, n - n_mature + 0.5) – Jeffries confidence interval – https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binomial_proportion_confidence_interval#Jeffreys_interval
Modeling

what is the log_odds between words that appear in the tv show descriptions and movie descriptions.
what words co-occur?

plot: graph of words that co-occur
plot: Log-odds of word’s specificity to genre

Lasso regression (glmnet)

does word predict rating?
cross validate glmnet, family “binomial”
